trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal"></xref> Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 在可视化设计器提供设计时支持<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal"> </xref> Web 服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control allows a text string to be used as a control on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>控件允许要用作网页上的控件的文本字符串。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 在可视化设计器中，当从源视图切换到设计视图中，标记源代码描述<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>控件进行分析，并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 当你切换回源视图时，设计时控件的标记源代码持久保存，并编辑向网页上的标记。

trans-unit.source: The LiteralDesigner class provides design-time support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control.
trans-unit.target: LiteralDesigner 类提供设计时支持<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LiteralDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method is called when there is a design-time change to the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LiteralDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>到关联的设计时更改时调用方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LiteralDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LiteralDesigner"></xref> class.

The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LiteralDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 内部构造的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LiteralDesigner>类时创建关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>控件或一份<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>设计图面上的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LiteralDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Called when there is a change to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 当关联控件的更改时调用。

trans-unit.source: The OnComponentChanged method is called when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control is raised.
trans-unit.target: OnComponentChanged 方法调用时<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>关联的事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>引发控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is in response to a property change on the control (for example, a `Properties` grid change).
trans-unit.target: 通常，这是为了响应在控件上的属性更改 (例如，`Properties`网格更改)。

trans-unit.source: The OnComponentChanged creates a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs> object and then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> base method.
trans-unit.target: OnComponentChanged 创建<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs>对象，然后调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>基方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The object that is the source of the event.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs"></xref> object that contains the event data.
